comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Baroness Hengelmuller, the ambassador's wife, was apparently the daughter of Count Alfred Dunin-Borkowski, the Austrian Minister to Dresden. The Baroness was widowed in 1917. Their only daughter is listed as marrying in 1923, so this photo is probably from at least a decade earlier than c1920 as shown. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ladislaus_Hengelm%c3%bcller_von_Hen...
